title: Graves Q bug
body: In my last game of Graves, I encountered the Q of graves not activating sometimes. This only happened when I did my q right next to a tower, or when I dashed right after the q was planted. Yet I got a full CD onto my Q despite having done any damage.

replies.body: First this is a german forum. Please write your Problems in the English Forums. Second Graves Q Stop Flying if it hits a wall/tower and so he loss his full range and don't deal damage. Next Question ask me or ask the english forum
